reviewText: This is my favorite television series of all time. Portillo is fantastic, it is the perfect blend of politics, history and travel. I only wish we could find the DVDs that play in the states! I would pay just about anything for them!

Good fun and well done! But, for the life of me I can't figure out how such a beautiful and cultured area as Europe could have  made such a mess of the 20th century and caused so many  horrors and misery for millions and millions of their countrymen...  Yeah I know, we  had our try at it during the US Civil War and I don't understand that either.
